titles.title: Equitable Contracting and Small Business Advancement Act
Equitable Contracting and Small Business Advancement Act
To require officials of the Department of Defense to provide a briefing on the implementation of category management memorandum, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Equitable Contracting and Small Business Advancement Act
This bill requires the Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Sustainment and the Office of Small Business Programs of the Department of Defense to annually provide a joint briefing to Congress on the implementation of the memorandum titled Achieving Small Business Goals through Category Management Practices (January 27, 2023). Among other elements, the briefing must describe the effects of the memorandum on contracting opportunities for small businesses.
